at.ac.univie.swe2.SS2017.team403

Class Area

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.univie.swe2.SS2017.team403.Area

  • public class Area
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to handle all operations connected to Area. An Area can be either one cell or more cells.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Area(Cell cell)
      This constructor is used to set a specific cell.
      Area(Cell cellTopLeft, Cell cellBottomRight)
      This constructor is used to set a range which contains different cells.
      Area(java.lang.String cellReferences, Worksheet worksheet, Cell cellContext)
      This constructor is used to set a referenced area of a cell.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getCellReferences()
      A cell contains multiple referenced cells as a string.
      int getFirstColumn()
      firstColumn -> left-side column.
      int getFirstRow()
      firstRow -> top row.
      int getLastColumn()
      lastColumn -> right-side column.
      int getLastRow()
      lastRow -> below row.
      Worksheet getParent()

      • Area

        public Area(Cell cellTopLeft,

        public Area(java.lang.String cellReferences,
            Worksheet worksheet,

        Parameters:
        cellReferences - -> references of the selected cell
        worksheet - -> selected worksheet
        cellContext - -> selected cell

      • getCellReferences

        public java.lang.String getCellReferences()
        A cell contains multiple referenced cells as a string. Here you get the cell content as a String.
        Returns:
        -> referenced area as a String
